import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Button,Modal,Form, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import OrgData from './PopModalOrgUnits'; const PopRequest = (props) => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false) const handleClose = () =>setShow(false) const handleShow = () =>setShow(true) const [value, setValue] = useState("") const data=props.data console.log(data) return (
{data.requestOrigin}
Requested vaccine: {Object.entries(data.request).map(e=>

{`${e[0]} Amount needed`} {e[1]}

)}
setValue(value)}/>
); } export default PopRequest;
